# Core Rule 0 ## Players must be, and act, 16 or above to play Monolith.
- A player's real life chronological age must be 16 years old to play the server. Secondly, [color=yellow]you must act as you are 16 or above.[/color]
- Players with immature personalities [color=red]can be removed with admin discretion under this rule.[/color]
- Finally, if you are proven to be intentionally withholding information that a player is under 16 in Monolith, you may be banned under this rule.
